Translations.Text: Da zai de xiaoxi, que yi jianglin nile,
zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi gongjing de,
laodong de, xinku de,
tamen jiang ru liehuo,
jiang yin fei quan,
tamen meiyou shiwu, dan you jingji,
ji buneng fei ren, you buneng chongji;
zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi xiangfu de,
shi wei qi laoji er yukuai de,
tamen jiang zai chonggao de leyuan zhong,
ting bu dao e yan,
limian you liu quan,
limian you gao ta,
you chenshezhe de bei zhan,
you pailiezhe de kaozhen,
you puzhankai de rongtan.
Nandao tamen bu guancha ma? Luotuo shi zenyang zaocheng de,
tian shi zenyang sheng gao de,
shanluan shi zenyang shu qi de,
dadi shi zenyang zhan kai de.
Ni dang jiaohui, ni zhishi jiaohui (tamen de),
ni jue bushi jiancha tamen de,
dan shui zhuanshen li qu erqie bu xindao,
zhenzhu jiang yi zuida de xingfa chengzhi shui.
Tamen biding zhi guiyu wo,
tamen de jihe, biding you wo fuze.
